alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:44AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lincoln, southeastern Stevens, northern Spokane and southwestern Pend Oreille Counties through 1215 PM PDT... At 1143 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles north of Davenport to 15 miles southwest of Cheney. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spokane, Spokane Valley, Cheney, Airway Heights, Medical Lake, Nine Mile Falls, Deer Park, Chewelah, Millwood, Fairwood, Suncrest, Fairchild AFB, Trentwood, Country Homes, Town And Country, Chattaroy, Dishman, Mead, Reardan, and Springdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 248 and 291. U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 255 and 309. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 91 and 95. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 165 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
